detail_desc: Wide blouse in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wide, elasticated neckline and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Wide blouse in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wide, elasticated neckline and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Straight-cut shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets with a pleat. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets with a pleat. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets with a pleat. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Soft cotton jersey T-shirts in various designs. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with a ribbed neckline and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with a ribbed neckline and long sleeves.

One-shoulder body in ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted button at the top and scalloped edges.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted button at the top and scalloped edges.
Heart-shaped metal earrings decorated with resin beads. Length 4 cm.
V-neck top in satin with a lace trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
V-neck top in satin with a lace trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.

Short skirt in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a high waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs, and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Glittery trainers with a print motif, embroidery and appliqués. Transparent soles with flashing LED lights in different colours that activate when you move. Adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Glittery trainers with a print motif, embroidery and appliqués. Transparent soles with flashing LED lights in different colours that activate when you move. Adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Lace body with a string back. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset.
Lace body with a string back. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset.

Short dress in a stretch jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover front and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.

Short dress in a stretch jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover front and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.

Dungaree dress and bodysuit in organic cotton. Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-stud fasteners. Soft brushed inside. Long-sleeved bodysuit in patterned jersey with a collar, decorative picot trims around the collar and cuffs, and press-studs at the back and crotch.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch imitation leather with a high waist, a fly with visible press-studs and a small, zipped front pocket. Slim legs with seams front and back and a zip at the hems.
Shoes in soft imitation suede with tassels at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Velour linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Handmade fabric bracelets, one decorated with wooden beads and one with plastic shells.

Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a lightly brushed weave. Slightly longer style with narrow notch lapels, thin shoulder pads, and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a lightly brushed weave. Slightly longer style with narrow notch lapels, thin shoulder pads, and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, buttons at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, buttons at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Trousers in a patterned linen and cotton weave with a draped knot detail at the front, concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length, wide legs.
Draped blouse in satin with a sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Draped blouse in satin with a sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved playsuit in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front that conceals the short legs. Detachable belt at the waist with a metal buckle covered in sparkly stones.

Wide, airy blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a wide collar that ties at the front, and buttons at the top. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long, wide sleeves, and cuffs with covered buttons.

Playsuit in an airy weave made from a ramie blend with notch lapels, buttons at the top and open chest pockets. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a seam with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and decorative buttons below the waist.
Metal necklaces in various lengths and designs. One with a faceted plastic pendant and two with round, embossed pendants. Length 48 cm, 59 cm and 71.5 cm.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Hat in a marled linen and cotton blend with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 3 cm.
Hi-tops in mesh with imitation leather details, an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Cardigan knitted in soft, organic cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas in soft fleece. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and jersey ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and jersey ribbing at the hems.

Straight-cut shirt in a checked cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Rounded hem.
Chinos in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with floral appliqués at the top, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, tiered tulle skirt. Satin lining. Matching hairband in a double layer of jersey with floral appliqués on the front and covered elastication at the back.
